attributes.action: confer the title of Knight of the Realm on George Ivan (Van) Morrison of Holywood, Northern Ireland, County Down
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Van Morrison this year celebrates the 40th anniversary of his classic, Belfast referential album "Astral Weeks".

This cultural ambassador has spread the word that it is okay to speak and sing in a Belfast accent for almost 50 years.  His music is known and loved throughout the world from early hits "Gloria", Here Comes The Night" and "Brown Eyed Girl in the Ring" to his more recent successes "Whenever God Shines His Light", "Rave on, John Donne" and "No Guru, No Method, No Teacher".

Though a friendly outgoing member of the community, little is known  of his charity work and humble community service he performs in East Belfast as a window cleaner.

A knighthood is long overdue
